original_solution_mapping.L1: Jose has half as many bottles of domestic wine as imported wine, or 2400/2=<<2400/2=1200>>1200 bottles of domestic wine.
original_solution_mapping.L2: In total, he has 2400+1200=<<2400+1200=3600>>3600 bottles of wine.
original_solution_mapping.L3: If the guests drink one-third of all his wine, then they will have consumed 3600/3=<<3600/3=1200>>1200 bottles of wine.
original_solution_mapping.L4: Thus, after the party, Jose's private cellar will have 3600-1200=<<3600-1200=2400>>2400 remaining bottles of wine.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 690.
    Returns: the number of bottles remaining in Jose's cellar.
    """
    # L1
    imported_wine_bottles = 2400 # 2400 bottles of imported wine
    domestic_wine_divisor = 2 # half as many bottles of domestic wine as imported wine
    domestic_wine_bottles = imported_wine_bottles / domestic_wine_divisor

    # L2
    total_wine_bottles = imported_wine_bottles + domestic_wine_bottles

    # L3
    consumed_divisor = 3 # one-third of all his wine
    consumed_bottles = total_wine_bottles / consumed_divisor

    # L4
    remaining_bottles = total_wine_bottles - consumed_bottles

    # FA
    answer = remaining_bottles
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: Jose has half as many bottles of domestic wine as imported wine, or {imported_wine_bottles}/{domestic_wine_divisor}=<<{imported_wine_bottles}/{domestic_wine_divisor}={domestic_wine_bottles}>>{domestic_wine_bottles} bottles of domestic wine.
In total, he has {imported_wine_bottles}+{domestic_wine_bottles}=<<{imported_wine_bottles}+{domestic_wine_bottles}={total_wine_bottles}>>{total_wine_bottles} bottles of wine.

If the guests drink one-third of all his wine, then they will have consumed {total_wine_bottles}/{consumed_divisor}=<<{total_wine_bottles}/{consumed_divisor}={consumed_bottles}>>{consumed_bottles} bottles of wine.

Thus, after the party, Jose's private cellar will have {total_wine_bottles}-{consumed_bottles}=<<{total_wine_bottles}-{consumed_bottles}={remaining_bottles}>>{remaining_bottles} remaining bottles of wine.
